title: Silver Brumby's Daughter
description: A silver brumby is special, but he will be hunted by man and horse alike, and must be stronger than both...Thowra's speed and courage have always saved him from the men who want to capture him - until now, when the men come on skis quickly and silently over the mountains. This time Thowra must protect his daughter from the hunters who prize the silver brumbies above any other horse.
author: Elyne Mitchell
